DOC.brief_summary: Cediranib is being tested to assess its effectiveness on the growth of kidney cancer tumours and also how well it is tolerated.
DOC.brief_title: Cediranib (AZD2171, RECENTINâ„¢) in Metastatic or Recurrent Renal Cell Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Confirmation of metastatic or recurrent renal cell carcinoma Certain types of previous anticancer therapy for Renal Cell Carcinoma Patients with type I insulindependent diabetes or poorlycontrolled type II insulinindependent diabetes Patients with a history of poorly controlled high blood pressure
